Class ViewRole2Home

java.lang.Object
guiRole2.ViewRole2Home
public class ViewRole2Home extends Object

Title: ViewRole2Home Class.

Description: The Java/FX-based Role2 Home Page for Staff Discussion Forum. This page provides a complete forum interface with CRUD functionality, allowing staff members to create, read, update, and delete posts. Includes filtering, searching, and post management features.

Copyright: CSE 360 Team Â© 2025

Version:
2.00 2025-01-XX Staff Forum CRUD Implementation
Author:
CSE 360 Team

  • Method Details

    • displayRole2Home

      public static void displayRole2Home(javafx.stage.Stage ps, entityClasses.User user)

      Method: displayRole2Home(Stage ps, User user)

      Description: This method is the single entry point from outside this package to cause the Role2 Home page to be displayed. It first sets up every shared attributes so we don't have to pass parameters. It then checks to see if the page has been setup. If not, it instantiates the class, initializes all the static aspects of the GIUI widgets (e.g., location on the page, font, size, and any methods to be performed). After the instantiation, the code then populates the elements that change based on the user and the system's current state. It then sets the Scene onto the stage, and makes it visible to the user.

      Parameters:
      ps - specifies the JavaFX Stage to be used for this GUI and it's methods
      user - specifies the User for this GUI and it's methods
